#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    for( int k = 1; k <= t; k++ )
    {
        cin.get();
        string s;
        int m, sum = 0;
        cin >> s >> m;
        for( int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++ )
        {
            sum = sum * 10 + s[i] - '0';
            sum = sum % m;
        }
        if( sum == 0 ) cout << "YES\n";
        else cout << "NO\n";
    }
}
